name: Adventure Cop
description:
All prisoners escaped! You are one of the first policemen who found the escaped criminals, now your goal is to stop them and not to reach the civilian population, you have weapons in your hands, which you can change to other items found in boxes, build traps, place mines, fences and much more, but be careful, all traps affect you, and every escaped prisoner will affect the next prisoner.



Adventure Cop - It is a two-dimensional platform-shooter in which the player has to build traps, shoot and dodge enemies in each of the unique levels.



Game features:
- Difficulty
- Installation of traps
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
